data.heading: MEEAMI
data.title: MultiChannel Echo Cancellation
data.description: Our AI AEC solution is fine-tuned to enable seamless ASR (Automatic Speech Recognition) activation and ensures crystal-clear audio quality in live conference calls. It's all about creating a noise-free, echo-free environment. What sets us apart is our optimization for low-power operation on embedded and edge devices, making it an ideal choice for products where energy efficiency is paramount. Say goodbye to echo issues and experience the future of audio clarity with Meeami's AI AEC

cards.description: Our cutting-edge technology is designed to excel in scenarios involving double talk, where multiple speakers engage in simultaneous conversation. With our solution, you can expect outstanding performance, clear communication, and efficient handling of double talk situations
cards.title: Superior Double Talk perform

cards.description: Our AI AEC ensures exceptional performance even in challenging conditions with low NER (Near-end to Echo Ratio) and high non-linear echo, delivering crystal-clear audio every time.
cards.title: Robustness against low NER (Near-end to Echo Ratio) and high non-linear echo

cards.description: Our AI AEC technology goes above and beyond, providing echo suppression of over 50dB. This remarkable feature guarantees pristine audio, free from unwanted echoes, for a truly immersive and disturbance-free listening or communication experience.
cards.title: Echo cancellation > 50dB

cards.description: Our AI AEC ensures uninterrupted, full-duplex conversations, even in demanding environments with a NER as low as 15dB. Experience crystal-clear, echo-free interactions wherever you are, without compromising on audio quality.
cards.title: Full duplex even up to for NER of ~ 15dB

data.heading: Explore
data.description: Unlock the power of audio AI with our state-of-the-art tool designed to revolutionize your sound experiences. Embrace the future of sound with our audio AI tool and discover a world of endless possibilities at your fingertips.
data.title: Try it now to transform your soundscapes like never before.

data.heading: Use Cases
data.description: In the realm of audio enhancement, our use case showcases the power of Multi-Channel Echo Cancellation, catering to stereo and multi-channel audio setups. This technology is engineered to eliminate unwanted echoes, ensuring that sound quality is pristine and interference-free across various audio configurations.
data.title: Stereo and Multi Channel echo cancellation
